curriculum_identification.title: Sustainability Data Analysis
curriculum_identification.pathway_position: Advanced learning unit in Level 5 Certificate in ESG Data Foundations

role_profile.title: Sustainability Data Analyst
role_profile.description: Specialist in ESG reporting and compliance who interprets sustainability data to support regulatory and organisational decisions.
role_profile.focus: ESG data analysis and regulatory compliance
role_profile.professional_context: This curriculum prepares learners to conduct comprehensive sustainability data analysis and deliver advanced ESG reporting that meets complex regulatory and stakeholder requirements. Graduates will master sophisticated analytical techniques, regulatory compliance frameworks, and advanced reporting methodologies. They typically serve as senior data specialists responsible for comprehensive sustainability analytics, regulatory compliance management, and the development of data-driven insights that inform strategic decisions.

ecf_detailed.A.1: IS and Business Strategy Alignment - Level 2

competence_frameworks_alignment.framework_note: Learning outcomes are mapped directly to GreenComp and e-CF framework descriptors

target_audience: Data analysts with foundational experience seeking to specialise in comprehensive sustainability analytics and advanced ESG reporting systems
learning_approach: EQF Level 5 professional development programme with 7.5 ECTS, combining theoretical knowledge with practical application through structured learning and standardised work-based learning integration.

assessment_framework.rationale: Advanced analysis programmes require sophisticated application of analytical techniques and regulatory knowledge
assessment_framework.wbl_component: Advanced workplace analytics and compliance reporting

employer_engagement.feedback_systems: Regular employer feedback on learning outcomes

quality_assurance.monitoring_systems: Regular quality monitoring of WBL delivery

flexible_learning_pathways.modular_design: Learning units designed for flexible recombination
flexible_learning_pathways.competence_catalog: Integrated with competence-based learning unit catalog
flexible_learning_pathways.pathway_flexibility: Multiple entry and exit points available

learning_units.learning_unit_description: Core sustainability concepts and their intersection with technology systems for digital professionals

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Compare regulatory compliance requirements for introduction to digital sustainability within professional sustainability practice.
learning_outcomes.skills: Organise Power BI visualisation of introduction to digital sustainability metrics to support organisational sustainability objectives.
learning_outcomes.competence: Contribute to team leadership in regulatory reporting activities related to introduction to digital sustainability while ensuring professional standards and stakeholder value.

learning_units.pathway_guidance: This learning unit forms part of the Advanced learning unit in Level 5 Certificate in ESG Data Foundations

dual_education_integration.mentor_support: Workplace mentor assigned for practical guidance
dual_education_integration.assessment_workplace: Workplace-based assessment comprising 40.0% of total assessment

catalog_reference.name: Introduction to Digital Sustainability
catalog_reference.description: Core sustainability concepts and their intersection with technology systems for digital professionals

stackability.horizontal_stacking: Can combine with other EQF 5 learning units
stackability.vertical_stacking: Can progress to EQF 6 advanced learning units

learning_units.learning_unit_description: Essential data skills for sustainability professionals requiring immediate deployment

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Evaluate data validation methodologies in sustainability data fundamentals within professional sustainability practice.
learning_outcomes.skills: Plan ESG database management for sustainability data fundamentals to support organisational sustainability objectives.
learning_outcomes.competence: Coordinate activities in audit support activities related to sustainability data fundamentals while ensuring professional standards and stakeholder value.

learning_units.learning_unit_description: Step-by-step guide to CSRD compliance and sustainability reporting requirements

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Assess audit trail requirements for corporate sustainability reporting directive (csrd) implementation within professional sustainability practice.
learning_outcomes.skills: Design compliance reporting using corporate sustainability reporting directive (csrd) implementation to support organisational sustainability objectives.
learning_outcomes.competence: Support management of compliance validation tasks in corporate sustainability reporting directive (csrd) implementation while ensuring professional standards and stakeholder value.

learning_units.learning_unit_title: Big Data for Environmental Intelligence (EQF 4 Version)
learning_units.learning_unit_description: Leverage big data technologies to analyze environmental patterns and trends (This learning unit has been adapted for EQF level 4.)

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Investigate ESG reporting standards relevant to big data for environmental intelligence (eqf 4 version) within professional sustainability practice.
learning_outcomes.skills: Manage Excel-based analysis of big data for environmental intelligence (eqf 4 version) data to support organisational sustainability objectives.
learning_outcomes.competence: Take responsibility for ESG data collection projects involving big data for environmental intelligence (eqf 4 version) while ensuring professional standards and stakeholder value.
